overview.zh: Bi23团队是一支有深厚扎实的技术开发经验的团队，专注于跨链资产研究，提供给用户安全、便捷的质押奖励服务和去中心化金融服务。目前Bi23不仅是Vite的超级节点，也是ViteX的运营商，积极深入的活跃在Vite生态建设及共识增加的事业中。Bi23亦是Cosmos、IRISnet、Tezos和Terra等项目的激活验证节点，这也证实了Bi23雄厚的技术背景和在加密货币领域的丰富经验。
overview.en: Bi23 team is an expericenced team in blockchain fields , focus on the Crypto-Assets, providing customers with Staking and DeFi services. Bi23 is not only the Third supernode of Vite, but also the operator of ViteX , through which we deeply participate in the construction of vite ecology and increasing consensus. Besides, Bi23 also are the active validators of Cosmos、IRISnet、Tezos and Terra , which proves Bi23's strong technical background and rich experiences in the field of Crypto-Assets..
